snippet: The artist and filmmaker shares with T personal images of her greatest influences.
abstract: Profile of Princess Olga of Greece highlights her unique upbringing and how it has shaped her personal aesthetic, which is mix of old world glamour and science; she is creative director for Christian Louboutin.
lead_paragraph: The artist and filmmaker shares with T personal images of her greatest influences.

headline.main: Inside Princess Olga of Greece’s Colorful, Art-Filled World
